pullRequest.title: Added Junit Tests
pullRequest.bodyText:
Added Junit tests for AboutEntry class
Added Junit tests for AboutScanner class
Added Junit tests for EventStoreQueryImpl class
Added Junit tests for EventStoreRecordCreatorImpl class
Added Junit Tests for EntityCache class
Added Junit Tests for KapuaCacheManager class
Added Junit Tests for NamedEntityCache class
Signed-off-by: Sonja sonja.matic@comtrade.com

nodes.bodyText:
For example in this case this makes sense.
There is no new and AboutScanner.scan() can return null even if is not designed to, if someone changes the implementation of scan()
